description: Creates a core network Connect peer for a specified core network connect attachment between a core network and an appliance. The peer address and transit gateway address must be the same IP address family (IPv4 or IPv6).

parameters.name: ConnectAttachmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the connection attachment.

parameters.name: BgpOptions
parameters.description: The Connect peer BGP options. This only applies only when the protocol is GRE. PeerAsn (integer) --- The Peer ASN of the BGP.

nested_params.name: PeerAsn
nested_params.description: The Peer ASN of the BGP.

parameters.name: InsideCidrBlocks
parameters.description: The inside IP addresses used for BGP peering. (string) ---

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags associated with the peer request. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters. Value (string) --- The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token associated with the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: ConnectPeer
nested_items.description: The response to the request.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of a core network.

nested_items.name: ConnectAttachmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the attachment to connect.

nested_items.name: ConnectPeerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: EdgeLocation
nested_items.description: The Connect peer Regions where edges are located.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the Connect peer was created.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of a core network.

nested_items.name: PeerAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: InsideCidrBlocks
nested_items.description: The inside IP addresses used for a Connect peer configuration.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol used for a Connect peer configuration.

nested_items.name: BgpConfigurations
nested_items.description: The Connect peer BGP configurations.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkAsn
nested_items.description: The ASN of the Coret Network.

nested_items.name: PeerAsn
nested_items.description: The ASN of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkAddress
nested_items.description: The address of a core network.

nested_items.name: PeerAddress
nested_items.description: The address of a core network Connect peer.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of key-value tags associated with the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The tag value.

nested_items.name: SubnetArn
nested_items.description: The subnet ARN for the Connect peer. This only applies only when the protocol is NO_ENCAP.

nested_items.name: LastModificationErrors
nested_items.description: Describes the error associated with the attachment request.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code for the Connect peer request.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message associated with the error code.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the requested Connect peer resource.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Connect peer request.
